title: Ranked

replies.body: Nah, it's all because of dynamic queue and the new team builder-esque role selection. Queues are longer because the system can only find each player two roles now, and there are differently sized parties to match up with everyone.

Yeah I get that, they really should make it put you in any role, even if you do choose two specific roles, to avoid long wait times, say if you'd passed the 10 minute wait timer, then it'd swap over and just put you in the first role available.

I'm in Bronze 2, personally I would assume that given bronze is a lower elo there would be more people trying to climb, but the new game mode really takes the community away from ranked.
What do you mean "awkwardly" ?

Good luck to you too. :)

I find solo queue is often alot less difficult, I find that if you play in teams you vs teams that have been playing together for ages and have audio communication, which instantly gives them an advantage over your team.
